title: Vegan French Toast rolls with peanut butter and chocolate filling
directions: 1. Mix the linseed and the water and let it stand for 10 minutes.
2. Cut off the edge of the toast from all sides. Then roll it out with a rolling pin very flat.
3. Add the peanuts, sugar and cocoa powder in a blender and mix until a creamy consistency is achieved.
4. Now fill the rolled toast with peanut butter. Then carefully roll together.
5. Mix the remaining ingredients together and dip the toast rolls in it.
6. Heat a nonstick pan with a little oil and toast for 1-2 minutes until they are golden brown.
7. Garnish with melted chocolate and powdered sugar.
ingredients: 240 grams of peanuts (or store bought peanut butter)
